# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

```julia-repl
function wrap_string(input_string, text_width = 10)
    words = split(input_string)
    result = ""
    line_length = 0

    for word in words
        if line_length + length(word) + (line_length != 0) > text_width
            result *= "\n"
            line_length = 0
        else
            if line_length != 0
                result *= " "
            end
            result *= word
            line_length += length(word) + 1 # account for space at the end of the word
        end
    end

    return result
end

# Test example
println(wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines"))
```
